STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.test:
deploy_test:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '-test' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml
    - helm upgrade --install "$CI_PROJECT_NAME-test" ./chart/
  environment:
    name: test
  except:
    refs:
      - master
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.acc:
deploy_acceptance:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '-acc' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml
    - helm upgrade --install "$CI_PROJECT_NAME-acc" ./chart/
  environment:
    name: acceptance
  only:
    refs:
    - develop
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.prod:
deploy_production:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml{{sentryScript}}
    - helm upgrade --install $CI_PROJECT_NAME ./chart/
  environment:
    name: production
  only:
    refs:
      - master
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.dags:
deploy_dags:
  tags:
    - kube-02.bmidevelopment
  dependencies:
    - build
  stage: deploy
  image: python:3
  before_script:
    - pip install awscli
  script:
    - "sed -i \"s/__NAME__/$(cat package.json | grep name | head -1 | sed 's/name//' | sed 's/[\\\",: ]//g')/g\" dags/*.py"
    - "sed -i \"s/__AUTHOR__/$(cat package.json | grep author | head -1 | sed 's/author//' | sed 's/[\\\",:]//g' | sed 's/^   //')/g\" dags/*.py"
    - 'sed -i "s/__DOCKER_IMAGE__/$(cat values.template.yml | grep dockerImage: | head -1 | sed ''s/dockerImage://'' | sed ''s/ //g'' | sed ''s/\//\\\//g'')/g" dags/*.py'
    - 'sed -i "s/__SECRETS__/$(cat values.template.yml | grep envSecretName: | head -1 | sed ''s/envSecretName://'' | sed ''s/ //g'' | sed ''s/__STAGE__//'')/g" dags/*.py'
    - sed -i "s/__VERSION__/$(echo $CI_COMMIT_SHA)/g" dags/*.py
    - export PROJECT_PATH=$(echo $CI_PROJECT_NAME | tr -s '-' | tr '-' '_')
    - aws s3 cp dags/ s3://meh-airflow-bucket/dags/dags/$PROJECT_PATH/ --recursive --include "*.py"
  only:
    refs:
      - master
